about_the_game: A classic RPG dungeon crawler.  Play the role of a child, fresh off the turnip truck, called upon by fate to save the kingdom from the creature from the great abyss.  Search out the Goracle for help in saving the kingdom.  Complete quests, collect magic items, study the arcane arts, or learn a new (Kung) Fu.
detailed_description: A classic RPG dungeon crawler.  Play the role of a child, fresh off the turnip truck, called upon by fate to save the kingdom from the creature from the great abyss.  Search out the Goracle for help in saving the kingdom.  Complete quests, collect magic items, study the arcane arts, or learn a new (Kung) Fu.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: 1280x768 or better display

name: The Goracle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES w.o hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*

short_description: Classic RPG Dungeon Crawler. Save the kingdom from the creature of the great abyss.
